titles.title: A resolution to authorize the production of records by the Committee on Foreign Relations.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of the Committee on Foreign Relations to provide to the Department of Justice records of the investigation of the Subcommittee on Near Eastern and South Asian Affairs of allegations relating to the release of American hostages held in Iran.
